metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15930 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
In ReadOneJNGImage in coders/png.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.26, a Null PointerDereference occurs while transferring JPEG scanlines, related to aPixelPacket pointer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15930` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.23-1ubuntu0.4
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.23-1ubuntu0.4
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.23-1ubuntu0.4
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.3.23-1ubuntu0.4
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.3.23-1ubuntu0.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.23-1ubuntu0.4').
